text: Tafea is one of the six provinces of Vanuatu. It has five main islands: Anneityum, Aniwa, Erromango, Futuna and Tanna, as well as many other smaller islands. Its capital is Isangel, but the largest town there is Lenakel. It is the southernmost province in Vanuatu. The province's name is an acronym of the five main islands: Tanna, Aneityum, Futuna, Erromango and Aniwa. ==References== Category:Provinces of Vanuatu
title: Tafea Province
